name: HOT, TASTY & ARMED
description:
"Do you want a hot-dog , illegal weapons or implants ?"

That's the job ! Buy weapons, sell, make tasty hotdog. Dodge the cops vigilance and make money to pay off your debt and buy your travel to the mars colony !



This game was created for LOWREZJAM 2020, the limitation of this competition is a resolution of 64x64 pixels screen only.
Use the mouse to play !

CREDITS :
Programmer : Shynif
Graphics : Robowarrior
Audio : Yann Roland
